structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.catch_line: Assessment by the fiscal court of additional fees on sheriff's service of subpoenas and civil summonses.

text.section:
A fiscal court, by ordinance, may assess additional fees on subpoena and civil summons service by the local sheriff for the purpose of paying expenses for courthouses, bonds related to them, and administration expenses of courthouses. The fees may be added as follows:
In addition to the fees normally charged for the service of a subpoena, the person requesting service may be charged a fee of ten dollars ($10); and
In addition to the fees normally charged for the service of a civil summons, the person requesting service may be charged a fee of ten dollars ($10).
Nothing in this section shall change any other fee allocation allowed by statute.

law.history: Created 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 54, sec. 4, effective March 15, 2001.
